# Backend Templates

Code templates for Spring Boot WebFlux applications.

| Template | Usage |
|----------|-------|
| [_template_controller.md](./_template_controller.md) | REST controller with logging and error handling |
| [_template_redis_cache.md](./_template_redis_cache.md) | Redis cache-aside pattern |
| [_template_redis_pubsub.md](./_template_redis_pubsub.md) | Redis pub/sub messaging |
| [_template_postgres_repository.md](./_template_postgres_repository.md) | R2DBC PostgreSQL repository |
